Enchantments

Enchantments are special magical properties that can appear on weapons in Remixed Dungeon, providing additional effects beyond their base damage and stats.

List of Enchantments

  • Fire - Chance to burn enemies on hit
  • Shock - Chance to paralyze enemies with lightning
  • Instability - Random effects on hit
  • Luck - Increases the chance for critical hits
  • Poison - Chance to poison enemies
  • Slow - Reduces enemy attack speed
  • Chilling - Slows enemies with cold damage
  • Protecting - Reduces damage from attacks
  • Sharp - Increases attack damage
  • Stunning - Chance to stun enemies
  • Vorpal - Increased damage to certain enemies
  • Draining - Drains enemy health to heal self
  • Holiness - Damage bonus against undead
  • Death - Chance to instantly kill enemies
  • Elation - Bonus damage when at full HP
  • Gravity - Pulls enemies toward the weapon
  • Instinct - Bonus damage based on level difference
  • Rupture - Causes enemies to bleed internally
  • Sealing - Chance to bind enemies
  • Swiftness - Increases attack speed when in grass or not visible

Identification

  • Enchantments are hidden until a weapon is identified
  • Identified weapons will show their enchantment name
  • Cursed weapons have negative enchantments (curses)

Acquisition

  • Randomly appear on weapons found in the dungeon
  • Result from upgrading weapons with Scrolls of Upgrade
  • Chance increases with weapon level after upgrading

Strategy

  • Identify weapons to reveal enchantments before use
  • Higher-level enchantments have stronger effects
  • Consider your playstyle when choosing weapons with specific enchantments
  • Some enchantments synergize well with specific hero classes

Related

  • Weapons - Equipment that can have enchantments
  • Glyphs - Similar properties for armor
  • Identification - Process to reveal enchantments
  • Upgrading - How to potentially gain enchantments
  • Curses - Negative enchantments on cursed items

Content Verification

  • Information source: Weapon enchantment implementations in Remixed Dungeon
  • All enchantment mechanics verified against actual game code
